comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Opera singer; in fall 1915 she was coming to the US, a 21-year-old from Trieste: "Toscanini Wavers Over His Return," New York Times (25 September 1915): 11.

comment._content: Thanks for the details about Ida Cajetti.  We will add more information when we update.
